name: PR Stats
description: A Slack bot which tells you how your GH Pull requests

GITHUB_API_TOKEN.description: The Authentication Token for the GitHub API.

GITHUB_TARGET_REPO.description: The repository you want to watch. It needs to be in 'owner/repository' format e.g. garrow/prstats

GITHUB_WATCH_LABEL.description: A label which marks your outstanding pull requests, e.g. 'Needs Review'
